title: Effective Teacher-Student Communication Strategy Design in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Implementing project-based learning in language education with systematic application of asynchronous/synchronous communication channels (forums, blogs, wikis, chats, etc.) using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can resolve project-related issues by appropriately utilizing various digital communication tools (email groups, discussion forums, real-time chat, wikis, group blogs) with instructors
Learners can analyze strengths/weaknesses of communication channels through reflective reviews and select optimal tools for specific learning contexts
Learners can document knowledge-building processes with peer learners and instructors using digital collaboration tools, and produce feedback-incorporated deliverables (e-portfolios)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
